author: bharath.vedartham
content:
This is a very relevant issue for block builders to be aware of: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/issues/575 
tagging <@&1458826346896687229> to bring attention to it
TLDR; builders will have to now construct an `ExecutionPayloadEnvelope` if their bid has been included in the block. The `ExecutionPayloadEnvelope` takes in a state_root field which is the post state root field after processing the `ExecutionPayloadEnvelope` without signature verification. 
Builders will have to use a beacon-api to generate the envelope. They would have to pass in the payload, blobs bundle etc
